title: Everything you need, nothing you don't! - ASRock @ Computex 2023
description: Thanks to ASRock for sponsoring this video! Check them out at:   Alex visits ASRock's booth at Computex. They have everything from motherboards to mini PCs. Find out what he thinks about it all in this video.  Buy an ASRock Z790 Taichi Motherboard:  Buy an ASRock Z790 Lightning Motherboard:  Buy an ASRock Z790 Riptide Motherboard:  Buy an ASRock Challenger Radeon RX 7600 8GB OC Graphics Card:  Buy an ASRock Steel Legend Radeon RX 7600 8GB OC Graphics Card:  Buy an ASRock AQUA Radeon RX 7900 XTX 24GB OC Graphics Card:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:10 Motherboards 2:36 Graphics Cards 4:48 BIG MONITOR 5:45 shmol monitors 7:28 Mini PCs 9:36 Outro

I really do appreciate that. On a lot of different mother boards, they're coming out with tool-less M.2 solutions and this is just taking it one step further for that ultimate ease of use.
